recommendations.title: Families Tighten Grip on Business Over Fears of Divorce
recommendations.excerpt: Business families are adding clauses in family agreements to prevent business shares from being divided in divorce settlements. These clauses ensure that shares stay within the family by limiting their transfer to non-family members. Families are seeking legal protections such as prenuptial agreements and trust structures to safeguard their business interests and ensure stability.
